titles: [A] profitable and pleasant glass of extraordinary expen[ces ...] Whereunto is added, the true assize of bread, according to the statute.
publisher: printed for E. Brewster, formerly living at the sign of the Crane in St. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Verse: "HIS farthing a day in full expence,".
Imperfect: copy cropped at head and sides with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
